#summary checkBox(objectName,property[label,wrapLabel,prepend,append,prependToLabel,appendToLabel, errorElement,checkedValue,uncheckedValue])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing a check box field form control based on the supplied `objectName` and `property`.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *objectName* || string || true || - || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *property* || string || true || - || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *label* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *wrapLabel* || boolean || false || true || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *prepend* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *append* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *prependToLabel* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *appendToLabel* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *errorElement* || string || false || div || See documentation for `textField` ||
|| *checkedValue* || string || false || 1 || The value of the checkbox when is on the state `checked` ||
|| *uncheckedValue* || string || false || 0 || The value of the checkbox when is on the state `unchecked` ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#checkBox(objectName="photo", property="isPublic", label="Is public?")#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}
